query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZTBEVADF1 ( MANDT , YYM , TYP , SNO , PJT , NAM , COD , NU1 , CST , CNO , BGT , DPT , ADR , NU2 , CDT , DDT , DCT , CKY , AMT , CNL , HBO , MBO , DSC , GIS , GYN , GMT , TPE , SPC , QTY , GBN , ELS , NU3 , NU4 , BAM , MGN , FDT , FIN , DS1 , HGB , BUP , BUN , PLT , PLN , TCD , DEL , DAT , TIM , USR , KNM , ACTSNM , KUNNR , LIFNR , CONTR_DA , BKUNM , BUDGET , AMT2 , LAB_C ) SELECT #G_MANDT# AS MANDT , TO_CHAR( CURRENT_DATE , 'YYYYMM') AS YYM , '14' AS TYP , (SELECT COALESCE( MAX(SNO) , 0 ) + 1 FROM SAPHEE.ZTBEVADF1 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND YYM = TO_CHAR( CURRENT_DATE , 'YYYYMM') AND TYP = '14' ) AS SNO , '' AS PJT , #POST1# AS NAM , #CMPY_CODE# AS COD , #CMPY_CODE# AS NU1 , #CEO_NAME# AS CST , '' AS CNO , '' AS BGT , '' AS DPT , #CMPY_ADDR# AS ADR , '' AS NU2 , '00000000' AS CDT , '00000000' AS DDT , '00000000' AS DCT , '' AS CKY , 0 AS AMT , '' AS CNL , 0 AS HBO , 0 AS MBO , '' AS DSC , '' AS GIS , '' AS GYN , 0 AS GMT , '' AS TPE , '' AS SPC , 0 AS QTY , '00' AS GBN , '' AS ELS , '' AS NU3 , '' AS NU4 , 0 AS BAM , 'A' AS MGN , '00000000' AS FDT , '2' AS FIN , '' AS DS1 , '' AS HGB , '1000' AS BUP , '' AS BUN , '' AS PLT , '' AS PLN , '' AS TCD , '' AS DEL , '00000000' AS DAT , '000000' AS TIM , '' AS USR , '' AS KNM , #CMPY_NAME# AS ACTSNM , '' AS KUNNR , '' AS LIFNR , '00000000' AS CONTR_DA , '' AS BKUNM , 0 AS BUDGET , 0 AS AMT2 , 0 AS LAB_C FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 WITH UR
